instruction: Generate a few examples of how technology can be used to improve online education.
output:
- Online virtual classrooms and digital whiteboards for better interaction between student and teachers.
 - Video-conferencing technology for more immersive learning sessions. 
 - Automated grading systems to provide faster feedback and improve student results. 
 - AI-powered chatbots for student support. 
 - Virtual assistant apps to help manage difficult course materials.
